amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the texts of the "Indian Financing Amendments Act of 2002", the "Yankton Sioux Tribe and Santee Sioux Tribe Equitable Compensation Act", the "Cherokee, Choctaw, and Chickasaw Nations Claims Settlement Act", the "Jicarilla Apache Reservation Rural Water System Act", the "Rocky Boy's/North Central Montana Regional Water System Act of 2002", and other miscellaneous provisions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hansen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
